text:
Global Technology Associates Recognized as One of Americas Fastest Growing Private Companies by Inc. Magazine
Global Technology Associates ranked as No. 2130 on the 2015 Inc. 5000 with three-year sales growth of 183%.
Reston, VA, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Global Technology Associates (GTA), a leading independent provider of engineering, software, and business consulting services to the telecommunications industry, is pleased to announce that it ranked number 2130 on Inc. Magazine’s prestigious list of Fastest Growing Private Companies in America for 2015. With a revenue growth of 183% over the past three years, GTA is among the top 50 Fastest Growing Private Companies (46th) in the US Telecommunications Industry.
Over the past two years, GTA has grown its engineering and business consulting services in significant size and volume and with the addition of its Software Applications and Tools division in 2014 the company is strategically positioned to provide comprehensive solutions ranging from chipset and field integration testing to end-to-end network optimization and performance management solutions. GTA's customer base includes wireless carriers, OEMs, technology companies, and other businesses having an interest in the telecommunications market segment.
“GTA is honored to be named by Inc. Magazine as one of America’s fastest growing private companies,” said Dee Alipanah, GTA’s CEO. “Our inclusion in this exclusive ranking confirms the fact that we are a proven market leader in innovative wireless engineering solutions.” Farzad Ghassemi, GTA’s Founder and Executive Chairman added, “GTA’s world class team along with their passion and drive that they bring into action everyday has made us successful.”
“The story of this year’s Inc. 5000 is the story of great leadership. In an incredibly competitive business landscape, it takes something extraordinary to take your company to the top,” says Inc. President and Editor-In-Chief Eric Schurenberg. “You have to remember that the average company on the Inc. 5000 grew nearly six-fold since 2012. Business owners don’t achieve that kind of success by accident.”
For more information about GTA’s solutions and opportunities, visit www.gtechassociates.net or call 703-476-8999.
About GTA:
Global Technology Associates is a leading independent provider of comprehensive solutions to the telecommunications industry that couple high-value engineering, technology, and business consulting services with proprietary software solutions. GTA's business is assisting clients with maximizing infrastructure potential and evolving networks, services and solutions to address market opportunities.
GTA leverages its talented and experienced engineers and technologists to execute through technical excellence, proven methodologies, and a commitment to providing superior service, products and solutions. Bridging the gap between business and technology, GTA provides a full range of services and solutions tailored to address client needs.
About Inc. Media:
Founded in 1979 and acquired in 2005 by Mansueto Ventures, Inc. is the only major brand dedicated exclusively to owners and managers of growing private companies, with the aim to deliver real solutions for today's innovative company builders. Winner of the National Magazine Award for General Excellence in both 2014 and 2012. Total monthly audience reach for the brand has grown significantly from 2,000,000 in 2010 to over 13,000,000 today. For more information, visit www.inc.com. The Inc. 500|5000 is a list of the fastest-growing private companies in the nation. Started in 1982, this prestigious list of the nation's most successful private companies has become the hallmark of entrepreneurial success.
